00029 namespace uStreamLib {
00036         class US_API_EXPORT SharedInt : public Mutex {
00037         public:
00041                 SharedInt(void);
00042 
00046                 virtual ~SharedInt(void);
00047 
00052                 int32 init(int32 value = 0);
00053 
00054                 SharedInt& operator=(int32 value)
00055                 {
00056                         MutexLocker ml(this); _value = value; return *this;
00057                 }
00058 
00059                 void operator++(void)
00060                 {
00061                         MutexLocker ml(this); _value++;
00062                 }
00063 
00064                 void operator--(void)
00065                 {
00066                         MutexLocker ml(this); _value--;
00067                 }
00068 
00069                 void operator+=(int32 add)
00070                 {
00071                         MutexLocker ml(this); _value += add;
00072                 }
00073 
00074                 void operator-=(int32 sub)
00075                 {
00076                         MutexLocker ml(this); _value -= sub;
00077                 }
00078 
00079                 int32 get(void)
00080                 {
00081                         MutexLocker ml(this); return _value;
00082                 }
00083         private:
00084                 /* the signed integer value */
00085                 int32 _value;
00086         };

00190         class US_API_EXPORT SharedString : public Mutex {
00191         public:
00195                 SharedString(void);
00196 
00200                 virtual ~SharedString(void);
00201 
00206                 int32 init(char* value = NULL);
00207 
00212                 int32 init(uint32 size);
00213 
00214                 SharedString& operator=(char* value)
00215                 {
00216                         MutexLocker ml(this); _value.xcopy(value); return *this;
00217                 }
00218 
00219                 SharedString& operator=(SharedString& value)
00220                 {
00221                         MutexLocker ml(this); _value.xcopy(value.get()); return *this;
00222                 }
00223 
00224                 char* get(void)
00225                 {
00226                         MutexLocker ml(this); return _value.toString();
00227                 }
00228         private:
00229                 /* copy constructor not available */
00230                 SharedString(SharedString&)
00231                 {
00232                 }
00233 
00234                 /* the value */
00235                 DataBuf _value;
00236         };
